item.title: Norman Lear Awards to Honor ‘The Pitt,’ ‘Dying for Sex,’ ‘Shrinking’ and More
item.description: The accolades, formerly titled the Sentinel Awards, from the Hollywood, Health & Society program at USC Annenberg’s Norman Lear Center, will be presented in October.

item.title: Watch Michael Urie Nail His Self-Taped Audition for ‘Shrinking’
item.description: The finely wrought comedic performance, delivered to an empty room, ended up landing the actor his Emmy-nominated role opposite Jason Segel and Harrison Ford.
